1552450.name: Fantasy Grounds - Space Dwellers!
1552450.description:
Space Dwellers!

Drones, Robots, and Space Dwellers!

This product includes:
  • Drone_hover_dark_fly[drone,robot,space,fly]
  • Drone_hover_green_fly[drone,robot,space,fly]
  • Drone_hover_red_fly[drone,robot,space,fly]
  • Drone_roller_beige[drone,robot,space,armored]
  • Drone_roller_blue[drone,robot,space,armored]
  • Drone_roller_red[drone,robot,space,armored]
  • Drone_Spider_Fire[drone,robot,space]
  • Drone_Spider_Fire_Broken[drone,robot,space,broken]
  • Drone_Spider_Frost[drone,robot,space]
  • Drone_Spider_Frost_Broken[drone,robot,space,broken]
  • Drone_Spider_Jaw[drone,robot,space]
  • Drone_Spider_Jaw_Broken[drone,robot,space,broken]
  • Merc_green[Space,Mercenary,Bounty,Thug]
  • Merc_pink[Space,Mercenary,Bounty,Thug]
  • Merc_Sand[Space,Mercenary,Bounty,Thug]
  • Trooper_Assault[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Rifle]
  • Trooper_DronePilot[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Pistol]
  • Trooper_Riot_Heavy[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Truncheon,Mace,Shock]
  • Trooper_Riot_Light[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Baton,Mace,Truncheon,Pistol]
  • Trooper_ShockDrone[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Drone,Robot,Shock]
  • Trooper_Siege[Trooper,Space,Guard,Marine,Soldier,Canon,Rifle,Launcher]
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
J Baptista
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
